titles.title: DIPLOMA Act
Developing Innovative Partnerships and Learning Opportunities that Motivate Achievement Act
DIPLOMA Act

A bill to strengthen student achievement and graduation rates and prepare children and youth for college, careers, and citizenship through innovative partnerships that meet the comprehensive needs of children and youth.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
